entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Confusing error message when using `in this` with an enum #73746
  • Invalid implicit cast of async lambda expression to Action #73745
  • Compiler chooses params span overload in expression trees leading to errors #73743
  • Unexpected behavior when using ref structs in foreach loop #73741
  • "Use collection expression" code fix drops comments in certain cases #73740
    Backlog
  • ArraySegment<T> s = []; leads to wrong initialization #73738
  • Better optimizations around combining string concatenation and string interpolation #73736
  • Having two embedded resources dependent on the same file causes CS1508 error #73735

Closed

  • IDE0055 false positive with `[..XXX]` pattern #73742

PullRequests

Created

  • Use a more sensible MEF export for brace completion #73756
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pause a short while before computing if fixes or refactorings are available at a particular line #73755
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update config after snap 17.11 Preview 2 #73754
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove explicit GC calls in the asset cache #73752
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove poison attributes #73751
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Fix issue where we were querying a linq expression over and over #73750
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update Debugger.Contracts to 17.11.0-beta.24274.2 #73748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move MutableNamingStyle to VS layer #73744
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change the DocumentationCommentId to use a PooledStringBuilder #73737
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Use a new consistent pattern for working with 'args' objects in callbacks #73749
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Snap 17.11 Preview 2 #73753
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Align sort implementation with reference from dotnet/runtime #73739
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.11 P2
  • Optimization of (de)serialization of ProjectId.DebugNames #73734
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.11 P2
  • Lower allocations in tagging #73729
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.11 P2
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73683
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, 17.11 P2

Updated

  • Don't implicitly load assemblies via MEF in Roslyn language server #73566
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement alg that determines which projects need to be restarted/rebuilt due to rude edits #73598
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Partial properties: public API and IDE features #73603
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Always use DiagnosticHelper.Create for diagnostics with options #73339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use a common mechanism so Taggers access the main thread at the same time. #67259
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up Razor EA #73040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache options we compute during refactoring operations (option1) #73725
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache options we compute during refactoring operations (option2) #73726
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Modify (Large/Source)Text.ParseLineStart to specify an initial capacity for line count #73701
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix race causing workspace diagnostics to be stale #73653
    Area-IDE, untriaged
